original_title: 羞恥　新任女教師が学習教材にされる男子校の性教育　生徒の目の前で無遠慮な指が膣に挿入される！プライドは崩壊するが、子宮の奥から愛液があふるれ出る
overview: Sex education at a boys' school where new female teachers are used as learning materials!  The serious world goes crazy little by little.  The breast of a female teacher who is rubbed and opened by a male teacher's unreserved finger in front of the student! Labia minora! vagina!  Shame is trampled and the beautiful face of the female teacher is distorted ...  However, strangely, love juice oozes from the back of the womb ...  Three popular actresses appear! Please thoroughly enjoy the Sadistic Village shame class!
title: Shame The New Female Teacher Was Forced To Become A Teaching Tool For Sex Education At This All Boys School They Helped Themselves To Fingering Her In Front Of All The Other Students! Her Pride Was In Shatters, But From Deep Inside Her Womb...
